ux-sidenav-drawer {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 3;
  background-color: var(--aurelia-ux--sidenav-drawer-background, var(--aurelia-ux--surface-control-background, white));
  color: var(--aurelia-ux--sidenav-drawer-foreground, var(--aurelia-ux--design-surface-foreground, black));
  -webkit-transition-duration: 400ms;
          transition-duration: 400ms;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1);
          transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1);
  -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-transform;
  transition-property: -webkit-transform;
  transition-property: transform;
  transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
}

ux-sidenav-drawer.ux-sidenav-drawer--left {
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
}

ux-sidenav-drawer.ux-sidenav-drawer--left.ux-sidenav-drawer--closed {
  -webkit-transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);
          transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);
}

ux-sidenav-drawer.ux-sidenav-drawer--right {
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
}

ux-sidenav-drawer.ux-sidenav-drawer--right.ux-sidenav-drawer--closed {
  -webkit-transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);
          transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);
}

ux-sidenav-drawer.ux-sidenav-drawer--bottom {
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
}

ux-sidenav-drawer.ux-sidenav-drawer--bottom.ux-sidenav-drawer--closed {
  -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);
          transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);
}
/*# sourceMappingURL=ux-sidenav-drawer.css.map */
